description.compact: Abstract class for diff renderers in PHP DiffLib.

docblock.description:

var.description: Instance of the diff class that this renderer is generating the rendered diff for.
Array of the default options that apply to this renderer.
Array containing the user applied and merged default options for the renderer.

description.compact: The constructor. Instantiates the rendering engine and if options are passed, sets the options for the renderer.

param.description: Optionally, an array of the options for the renderer.

description.compact: Set the options of the renderer to those supplied in the passed in array.

docblock.description: Options are merged with the default to ensure that there aren't any missing options.
